name: ColdWall
description:
An infiltration game where the character is American trapped on the east side of the Berlin wall. He will have to find a way to pass from the west side of the Berlin wall. He will have to be able to find the best passage and place for the Berlin wall and learn the techniques and the design of the wall.

The player will therefore have to observe the different stages to cross the wall. At the beginning of the game, NPCs explain to the player the different stages and mechanics of the game. Then he can go back to his little house in the forest to be able to prepare to leave the East side.

At first he will have to go to the crossing point of the wall while avoiding the monitoring spot of the wall. He will have to cut the current of the electric fence to be able to pass the wall and the fence. Then the player will have to avoid the dogs rounds and the gards to pass without being detected.

Gardians will go around to watch if someone is trying to escape. Then there will be a series of spots to avoid while walking. There are some stones that you can walk on them to avoid let your steps in sand. Then there is more than to cross the last wall by a small hole and escape quickly. If the player is caught by the guards, he will be executed, so he will have to start the game again and there aren't any checkpoints
